events.headline: RocketBurger beats earnings!
events.description: RocketBurger reported better-than-expected profits this quarter.
events.explanation: When a company makes more money than people expected, investors get excited and buy more stock, pushing the price UP!
events.learningTip: Earnings reports come out every 3 months. They show how much money a company made.

events.headline: VitaJuice misses expectations
events.description: VitaJuice's new healthy snack didn't sell as hoped.
events.explanation: When a company's results are worse than expected, investors may sell their stock, pushing the price DOWN.
events.learningTip: Even healthy food companies can have bad quarters. That's why we don't put all eggs in one basket!

events.headline: RocketBurger announces new menu!
events.description: Kids are lining up for RocketBurger's new Space Fries!
events.explanation: New products that customers love can boost a company's sales and stock price!
events.learningTip: Companies try to innovate to attract more customers.

events.headline: Fitness craze sweeping the nation!
events.description: Everyone's focused on health and exercise this summer.
events.explanation: When lots of people want healthy products, all health companies benefit!
events.learningTip: Trends in society affect which sectors do well.

events.headline: Kids on summer break = more screen time!
events.description: Tech companies see higher usage during summer vacation.
events.explanation: When kids have more free time, they use more phones and games, helping tech companies!
events.learningTip: Seasonal patterns can affect stock prices predictably.

events.headline: RocketBurger recalls burgers!
events.description: Safety issue found with some RocketBurger products.
events.explanation: Bad news about a company's products makes investors nervous and they may sell.
events.learningTip: Companies that fix problems quickly often recover over time.

events.headline: New law promotes clean energy!
events.description: Government announces incentives for solar panels.
events.explanation: Government policies can help or hurt companies. This law helps green energy!
events.learningTip: Following the news helps you understand which companies might be affected by new laws.

events.headline: Market jitters: Investors nervous
events.description: Uncertainty about the economy has everyone worried today.
events.explanation: Sometimes the whole market goes down because everyone is nervous at once. This is normal!
events.learningTip: Market-wide drops happen sometimes. Patient investors often wait for recovery.

events.headline: Great economic news: Jobs are up!
events.description: The economy is doing great and everyone's feeling optimistic!
events.explanation: Good economic news makes everyone more confident, and the whole market goes up!
events.learningTip: A rising tide lifts all boats - when the economy is strong, most stocks benefit.

events.headline: CloudKids releases hit game!
events.description: The new CloudKids adventure game is #1 on all platforms!
events.explanation: A hit product means more sales and more profits for the company!
events.learningTip: Pay attention to product releases - they can move stock prices significantly.
